COMMENTS: This is config file for the shop potion command
SHOP_POTION_COMMAND is a list of the prefix that is used for command
If viewer type only prefix, it will say list of the potion by
format as SHOP_POTIONS_ONE_MESSAGE_DEFAULT of each potion
separate by SHOP_POTIONS_SEPARATOR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
and finally say as format SHOP_POTIONS_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
If viewer type the slot number (leftmost is 1)
say as format SHOP_POTION_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
<T_VIEWER> is the ID of Twitch viewer typed command
<SP_NUMBER> is the slot of the potion(starts from 1, convert to positive)
<SP_NAME> is the name of potion
<SP_DESC> is the description of potion
<SP_LIST> is the list of parsed potion
SHOP_POTION_ENABLED determine whether use this command. true/false
SHOP_POTION_ALL_ENABLED determine whether use say all command(without number). true/false
SHOP_POTION_ONE_ENABLED determine whether use say one command(with number). true/false
TIMEOUT_GLOBAL is the global cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for this command
TIMEOUT_ALL is the cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for say all command
TIMEOUT_ONE is the cooldown(ms, 1000ms=1second) for say one command, applied for each slot
MAX_LEN is the max length of the description of one potion (2147483647 = infinite)
example of the default, !sr -> @gyeryak Block Potion(1), Energy Potion(2), Strength Potion(3)
example of the default, !sr 2 -> @gyeryak (2) Energy Potion: Gain 2 Energy.
Be careful of the JSON and Regex
